actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution making certain Minority party assignments.

summary.text: Makes minority party committee assignments as follows: (1) Mr. Dixon, of Illinois, to the Committee on Armed Services; (2) Mr. Levin, of Michigan, to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources; (3) Mr. Lautenberg, of New Jersey, to the Committee on Environment and Public Works; (4) Mr. Pryor, of Arkansas, to the Committee on Governmental Affairs; and (5) Mr. Johnston, of Louisiana, and Mr. Bingaman, of New Mexico, to the Special Committee on Aging.

titles.title: A resolution making certain Minority party assignments.
